name: R2D2's escape from planet X
description:
After a wild party you find yourself lost in a jungle.. even worse, it appears to be on an unknown planet and you have lost your ship.

You must find your ship and leave this place before master Luke finds you missing!

Remember:

  • To pass thru gate you must have at least 20 gold coins
  • Keys open hidden chests with total of 10 coins
  • If enemies touch you - you die
  • But luckily you can blast them with your flamethrower!
  • Press Escape to pause or unpause game

Controls:

  • Esc - to pause and unpause game
  • WSAD or arrow keys to move R2D2
  • Right mouse button to launch flamethrower

NB! This is my first Unity game made for educational purposes and I don't own any copyrighted characters or music you will see/hear in the game, its fan fiction.
